document_data.mainbody:
rista Kettlecopp was a dwarf who lived in Phandalin in the late 15 century DR.
Grista owned and ran the Sleeping Giant taproom. She did not keep the pub clean, and it attracted the ruffians of Phandalin, like the Redbrands.
She was described to be bad-tempered, rude, and unpleasant. She valued being left alone to run her business the way she saw fit, and had no desire to get involved with anyone elses personal business.
